description:
With a new official crewmate, the Straw Hat Pirates are ready to set sail.  Lola shares with Nami a unique item only available in the New World!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Crewmate! The Musician, Humming Brook!
Arata na Nakama! Ongakuka Hanauta no Brook
Un nouveau compagnon ! Brook, musicien et fredonneur
新たな仲間! 音楽家・鼻唄のブルック
